title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.14 - Motions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.14 - Motions

State Regulations
(a) A motion to dismiss the
statement of charges for failure of proof may be made at the conclusion of the Attorney General's case. (b) The hearing officer may: (1)
grant the motion; (2)
deny the motion and continue the hearing; or
(3)
reserve making a
decision on the motion and continue the hearing. (c) Denial of the motion by the hearing
officer is not appealable because it is not a final decision on the merits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
97.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
